name: Refurbo Shop
description:
A 3D casual puzzle game where you meet different robot characters at a factory. You are tasked to give anything to these robots to make them leave in satisfaction.

Interactions are simple as grabbing  objects and moving them towards the robots. The challenge is grabbing the objects and putting them in the boxed compartments that turn green if item is successfully given.

Player Controls:

Mouse arrow to move and grab the objects on the conveyor belt.
